summary: Just a little change for Cicero.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a small mod I made for personal use that gives Cicero green eyes, different hair and a Joker style face-paint from The Dark Knight. The scars and black eye paint are NOT made by me, I got permission from another mod author to use it in this mod. The request is on there in the comments section in case there's any doubt. Check it out and be sure to download and install it first, before my mod. This is only my second mod so let me know if there's any problems.

Also -  .This is intended for a fresh play-through.
          .Make sure to download all three files in the file section.
          . Cicero doesn't apply his makeup until you meet him at the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary for the first time. 

And if you want to get him how he looks in the picture make sure to download - 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23755]Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/requirements/?id=80625][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/contents/images/icons/cancel.png[/img] [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510]Superior Lore-Friendly Hair - HD textures[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/requirements/?id=80625][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/contents/images/icons/cancel.png[/img] [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty

[/url]


Credit - Skyrim: Why So Serious?" - by Professorxavi 
Download it here -  http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=322477439
author: JPFire07
